name: Evanescent Eclipse
description:
DISCLAIMER: Currently only one main character is playable.

Evanescent Eclipse is a short story for the interact-if game jam.

✦ Story ✦

The moon is destined to line up with the sun and plunge the world into darkness, temporarily turning day into night.

Two babies are born at that moment, separated by space but connected by fate. One is a child of struggling farmers. The other one will live a lonely life in the forest. It's only a matter of time before they meet, before they bond. They'll share their happiness, and they'll find solace in each other's company.

It's a pity that the eclipse will not last long.

✦ Features ✦

✦ Two main characters. Play as one of them, and interact with the other. Customize them, and choose whether their relationship is platonic or romantic.

✦ You and them. Can you ignore everything around you in a favor of them? Can they do the same?

✦ Fate. Try to go against its tides or accept the unknown.

✦ Content warnings for possible themes of sickness and death.
